children.title: History & management
children.question: Please provide a briefing on $company, including everything we need to know about their history, senior leadership, and core product categories.

children.title: Product & service portfolio
children.question: Please provide a detailed review of $company's product and service portfolio, and summarize their target customer(s).

children.title: Customer base
children.question: Please provide a detailed analysis of $company's customer base. Who are they, where are they, and what motivates them?

children.title: Future plans & opportunities
children.question: What is $company's senior management saying about company priorities, opportunities for growth, and new markets for expansion? Please examine recent media coverage, earnings call transcripts, and any other statements available online.

children.title: Recent partnerships
children.question: Please provide an overview of $company's recent partnerships, sponsorships, and public initiatives. Please include both business-related and philanthropic (i.e. in the realm of corporate social responsibility).

children.title: Market-size

country.label: Enter country name (or "global")
country.description: We currently support one country (or a general global figure) per request.

industry.label: Enter industry/space name
industry.description: Tip: no need to include "industry" at the end.

children.question: What is the $country market-size (TAM) for $company in the $industry industry?

children.title: Major competitors
children.question: Who are $company's three major competitors and how are they differentiated from product and brand positioning perspectives?

children.title: Major advantage in the market
children.question: What is $company's competitive advantage and what are the market mechanics that would prove or disprove that advantage?

children.title: Social presence
children.question: How does $company's social presence compare to that of its top three competitors? Please provide an x-ray on how active competitors are on the various social channels, type of content they’re posting, and the size and relative engagement levels of their audiences.

children.title: Marketing campaigns
children.question: What were the most successful marketing campaigns run by $company in the past three years, and what impact did they have on the brand?

children.title: Growth drivers
children.question: What were the primary drivers of $company's growth in market share over the past few years and what strategies are they most likely to employ going forward?

children.title: Build list of companies

listSize.label: Set list size
listSize.description: We currently support up to 10 per request.

criteria.label: Enter selection criteria
criteria.description: E.g. only select companies with >50 employees

include.label: For each, find/include...
include.description: E.g. name, contact email, linkedin, etc

children.question: Build me a list of up to $listSize companies that meet the following criteria: $criteria. For each, please include $include.

children.title: Identify contacts at company

listSize.label: Set list size
listSize.description: We currently support up to 10 per request.

criteria.label: Enter selection criteria
criteria.description: E.g. only select companies with >50 employees

include.label: For each, find/include...
include.description: E.g. name, contact email, linkedin, etc

children.question: Build me a list of up to $listSize, people at $company that meet the following criteria: $criteria. For each, please include $include.

children.title: Best companies in industry

industry.label: Enter industry/space name
industry.description: Tip: no need to include "industry" at the end.

listSize.label: Set list size
listSize.description: We currently support up to 10 per request.

criteria.label: Enter selection criteria
criteria.description: E.g. only select companies with >50 employees

include.label: For each, find/include...
include.description: E.g. name, contact email, linkedin, etc

children.question: Build me a list of up to $listSize companies in the $industry industry that meet the following criteria: $criteria. For each, please include $include.

children.title: Strategy overview
children.question: What is $company's overarching brand and marketing strategy and how has it performed?

children.title: Most successful marketing campaigns
children.question: What were the most successful marketing campaigns run by $company in the past five years (including relationships with notable spokespersons), and what impact did they have on the brand?

children.title: Most interesting strategies in this space
children.question: Which companies in $company's space are employing the most innovative strategies / tactics to engage their audience via social media and what are those strategies (beyond traditional postings).

children.title: Competitor’s strategies
children.question: What are the most innovative strategies / tactics that $company's competitors are utilizing to grow brand awareness and/or engagement.

children.title: Thought leadership
children.question: Please assess and examine $company's thought leadership within their industry, identifying any white papers, proprietary surveys and data, views they published on product category, indications of how they are generally regarded by their peers, etc.

children.title: Awards & recognitions
children.question: Please identify all of the awards, honors, and recognitions $company has received in the past 5 years.

children.title: Social media snapshot
children.question: Please perform an x-ray of $company's Facebook and Twitter presence and provide an overview on the type of content they are posting, how active they are, and an assessment of the size and relative engagement level of their audience.

children.title: Most important recent news
children.question: Please identify and summarize $company's most important events, announcements, and press mentions from the past 3 months.

children.title: Prevalent themes & topics
children.question: What themes or topics were most prevalent in $company's press mentions and company announcements over the past 6 months? Please provide a detailed review of where the conversations have been focused.

children.title: Tone & sentiment analysis
children.question: What is the tone and overall market sentiment around $company? Please provide a briefing on the most recent media coverage from the past 3 months and any insights that can be drawn from consumer reactions on social channels.

children.title: Thought leadership
children.question: Please assess and examine $company's thought leadership within their industry, identifying any white papers, proprietary surveys and data, views they published on product category, indications of how they are generally regarded by their peers, etc.

children.title: Awards & recognitions
children.question: Please identify all of the awards, honors, and recognitions $company has received in the past 5 years.
